00015 /**
00016  * dispatcher. this is the first thing that is constructed.
00017  * the dispatcher then collects all parameters given via get/post and instanciates the right controller
00018  * @package kata
00019  */
00020 class dispatcher {
00021              /**
00022               * placeholer-array for all relevant variables a class may need later on (e.g. controller)
00023               * [isAjax] => false (boolean, tells you if view got called with /ajax/)
00024               * [url] => Array (
00025               *       [url] => locations
00026               *       [foo] => bar (if url read ?foo=bar)
00027               * )
00028               * [form] => Array (
00029               *             (all post-variables, automatically dequoted if needed)
00030               * )
00031               * [controller] => main (name of the controller of this request)
00032               * [action] => index (name of the view of this request)
00033               * @var array
00034               */
00035              public $params;
00036 
00037              /**
00038               * name of the current controller
00039               * @var string
00040               */
00041              public $controller;
00042 
00043              /**
00044               * time in us the dispather started (used to calculate how long the framework took to completely render anything)
00045               */
00046              private $starttime;
00047 
00048              /**
00049               * constructor, just initializes starttime
00050               */
00051              function __construct() {
00052                           $this->starttime= microtime(true);
00053              }
00054 
00055              /**
00056               * destructor, outputs Total Render time if DEBUG>0
00057               */
00058              function __destruct() {
00059                           if (DEBUG > 0) {
00060                                        kataDebugOutput('Total Render Time (including Models) '. (microtime(true) - $this->starttime).' secs');
00061                                        kataDebugOutput('Memory used '.number_format(memory_get_usage(true)).' bytes');
00062                                        kataDebugOutput('Parameters '.print_R($this->params, true));
00063                                        if (function_exists('xdebug_get_profiler_filename')) {
00064                                                     $fn= xdebug_get_profiler_filename();
00065                                                     if (false !== $fn) {
00066                                                                  kataDebugOutput('profilefile:'.$fn);
00067                                                     }
00068                                        }
00069                                        kataDebugOutput('Loaded classes: '.implode(' ', array_keys(classRegistry :: getLoadedClasses())));
00070                           }
00071              }
00072 
00073              /**
00074               * start the actual mvc-machinery
00075               * 1. constructs all needed params by calling constructParams
00076               * 2. loads the controller
00077               * 3. sets all needed variables of the controller
00078               * 4. calls constructClasses of the controller, which in turn constructs all needed models and components
00079               * 5. render the actual view and layout (if autoRender is true)
00080               * 6. return the output
00081               * @param string $url raw url string passed to the array (eg. /main/index/foo/bar)
00082               */
00083              final function dispatch($url, $routes= null) {
00084                           $this->constructParams($url, $routes);
00085 
00086                           try {
00087                                        $lowername= strtolower($this->params['controller']);
00088 
00089                                        if ('appcontroller' == $lowername) {
00090                                                     $this->fourohfour();
00091                                                     return;
00092                                        }
00093 
00094                                        kataUse('controller');
00095                                        if (file_exists(ROOT.'controllers'.DS.$lowername.'_controller.php')) {
00096                                                     require (ROOT.'controllers'.DS.$lowername.'_controller.php');
00097                                        } else {
00098                                                     if (file_exists(LIB.'controllers'.DS.$lowername.'_controller.php')) {
00099                                                                  require (LIB.'controllers'.DS.$lowername.'_controller.php');
00100                                                     } else {
00101                                                                  $this->fourohfour();
00102                                                                  return '';
00103                                                     }
00104                                        }
00105 
00106                                        $classname= ucfirst($lowername).'Controller';
00107 
00108                                        // no need for class_registry usage here, as we can only have 1 controller
00109                                        $c= new $classname;
00110                                        $this->controller= $c;
00111 
00112                                        $c->basePath= $this->constructBasePath();
00113                                        $c->base= $this->constructBaseUrl();
00114                                        $c->webroot= $c->base.'webroot/';
00115                                        $c->params= & $this->params;
00116                                        $c->action= $this->params['action'];
00117 
00118                                        if (!is_callable(array (
00119                                                                  $c,
00120                                                                  $this->params['action']
00121                                                     )) || ($this->params['action'] { 0 }
00122                                                     == '_')) {
00123                                                     $this->fourohfour();
00124                                                     return;
00125                                        }
00126 
00127                                        $c->_constructClasses();
00128                                        if (!empty ($this->params['isAjax'])) {
00129                                                     $c->layout= null;
00130                                        }
00131 
00132                                        $c->beforeAction();
00133 
00134                                        call_user_func_array(array (
00135                                                     & $c,
00136                                                     $this->params['action']
00137                                        ), empty ($this->params['pass']) ? null : $this->params['pass']);
00138 
00139                                        if ($c->autoRender) {
00140                                                     $c->render($this->params['action']);
00141                                        }
00142                           } catch (Exception $e) {
00143                                        $basePath= $this->constructBasePath();
00144                                        if (file_exists(ROOT."views".DS."layouts".DS."error.thtml")) {
00145                                                     include ROOT."views".DS."layouts".DS."error.thtml";
00146                                        } else {
00147                                                     include LIB."views".DS."layouts".DS."error.thtml";
00148                                        }
00149                                        return '';
00150                           }
00151 
00152                           if ($this->params['isAjax'] == 1) {
00153                                        header('Content-Type: application/xml');
00154                           }
00155 
00156                           return $c->output;
00157              }
00158 
00159              function fourohfour() {
00160                           $basePath= $this->constructBasePath();
00161                           if (file_exists(ROOT."views".DS."layouts".DS."404.thtml")) {
00162                                        include ROOT."views".DS."layouts".DS."404.thtml";
00163                           } else {
00164                                        include LIB."views".DS."layouts".DS."404.thtml";
00165                           }
00166              }
00167 
00168              /**
00169               * extract,clean and dequote any given get/post-parameters
00170               * find out which controller and view we should use
00171               * @param string $url raw url (see dispatch())
00172               */
00173              private function constructParams($url, $routes= null) {
00174                           if (!empty ($routes) && is_array($routes)) {
00175                                        foreach ($routes as $old => $new) {
00176                                                     if ($old == $url) {
00177                                                                  $url= $new;
00178                                                                  break;
00179                                                     }
00180                                                     if (($old != '') && ($old == substr($url, 0, strlen($old)))) {
00181                                                                  $url= $new.substr($url, strlen($old));
00182                                                                  break;
00183                                                     }
00184                                        }
00185                           }
00186 
00187                           $paramList= explode('/', $url);
00188 
00189                           if (isset ($paramList[0]) && ($paramList[0]) == 'ajax') {
00190                                        array_shift($paramList);
00191                                        $this->params['isAjax']= 1;
00192                           } else {
00193                                        $this->params['isAjax']= 0;
00194                           }
00195 
00196                           if (isset ($paramList[0]) && !empty ($paramList[0])) {
00197                                        $controller= strtolower(array_shift($paramList));
00198                           } else {
00199                                        $controller= "main";
00200                           }
00201 
00202                           if (isset ($paramList[0]) && !empty ($paramList[0])) {
00203                                        $action= strtolower(array_shift($paramList));
00204                           } else {
00205                                        $action= "index";
00206                                        if (isset ($paramList[0]))
00207                                                     unset ($paramList[0]);
00208                           }
00209 
00210                           $this->params['pass']= $paramList;
00211 
00212                           if (!empty ($_GET)) {
00213                                        unset ($_GET['kata']);
00214                                        if (ini_get('magic_quotes_gpc') == 1) {
00215                                                     $this->params['url']= stripslashes_deep($_GET);
00216                                        } else {
00217                                                     $this->params['url']= $_GET;
00218                                        }
00219                           }
00220 
00221                           if (!empty ($_POST)) {
00222                                        if (ini_get('magic_quotes_gpc') == 1) {
00223                                                     $this->params['form']= stripslashes_deep($_POST);
00224                                        } else {
00225                                                     $this->params['form']= $_POST;
00226                                        }
00227                           }
00228 
00229                           $this->params['controller']= $controller;
00230                           $this->params['action']= $action;
00231              }
00232 
00233              /**
00234               * construct the url path under which this framework can be called from the browser. adds / at the end
00235               * @return string
00236               */
00237              private function constructBasePath() {
00238                           $base= dirname(dirname(env('PHP_SELF')));
00239                           if (substr($base, -1, 1) != '/') {
00240                                        $base .= '/';
00241                           }
00242                           return $base;
00243              }
00244 
00245              /**
00246               * tries to construct the base url under which this framework can be called from the browser. adds a "/" at the end
00247               */
00248              private function constructBaseUrl() {
00249                           return 'http'. (env('HTTPS') != '' ? 's' : '').'://'.
00250                           env('SERVER_NAME'). (env('SERVER_PORT') != '80' ? (':'.env('SERVER_PORT')) : '').
00251                           $this->constructBasePath();
00252              }
00253 } //class
